100% Pure Lavender Tonique

Brand: 100% Pure

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe) Leaf Juice*, Alcohol*, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract*, Glycerin, Dimethyl Sulfone (MSM), Dimethylaminoethanol Bitartrate (DMAE) *Organic Ingredients
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
